评论概述: Fell apart, ugly, just filling a landfill 💔

I tried to reshape it with heat from my blowdryer but it just looked crumpled up no matter what... the lace is folded up and too small. Looks super cheap!  It came with a cute bat Keychain. But not worth it.  Save yourself time and money and don't buy this. It'll just end up in a landfill unfortunately.

I love the back pack and the keychain it came with. Unfortunately the key chain arrived broken and the lace is cut. I'm pretty disappointed with all the damage. I don't want to deal with an exchange or refund.. I hope they do better on the production line. The wings are also bent out of shape.

评论概述: Omg it so much better in person

Perfect mini backpack size. Very cute and good quality. Great price and delivery.
Looks like exactly as pictured. Feels and appears durable. My daughter loves it!

评论概述: It's cute and is a good size
评论详情: The purse is a good size. I have a big wallet and it fits inside just fine along with other essentials. It has a good amount of pockets which I like. Now for what I didn't like. The wings are smashed, it came smashed in a bag so not really surprised. Would have been nice if the wings were wrapped in foam or something so they could keep their shape. I tried to reshape it by hand but it didn't work. I'm probably going to have to warm it with a blow dryer and reshape it so it holds its desired shape. Second there is an very in your face plastic smell that's pretty overwhelming. It's almost nauseously strong. I'll probably have to put it in another room for a few days before I can use it. It needs to air out a lot. It came with a really cute little bat Keychain and I like the bag overall just needs some work to look as pictured.

评论概述: Smells strong needed to air it out for a day
评论详情: Very stiff the bat wings still do not look right
It seems to be well made. It’s cute and sturdy. I love the keychain.

I got this for one of my best friends last year or 2 years ago and it’s still holding up strong! She loves it very much and you can fit a lot in it as well. So it’s pretty spacious. So if your alternative like me and my friend this is a great backpack purse because it’s super cute, great quality, and spacious.

评论概述: Wings are Wonky but we're Working With it!
评论详情: As headlined, wings are super wonky. There's no stuffing or wiring that holds them in any position. (Especially not the position in the photos) The lace is too thin to lay right, and the wings are attached poorly and inaccurately. That said, I have already switched bags to this one and it isn't intolerable. I actually like it. The wings look a lot more suitable when worn.
loved the bag until the zipper fell off then I had to rip it open

评论概述: Made out of cardboard. Horrible quality even for the low price point
评论详情: Bag is horrible quality honestly. If you don’t have the money to spend on a lot of accessories or staple pieces I highly advise you to choose something else. The best part about the bag was the surprise free bat keychain. The lace was cut & measured too short for the bag so it will never hold form like in the picture. The wings are attached weird. The lining is horrible cheap quality & seen too tight so you can hardly fit anything inside the pockets. Though the bag is seemingly spacious inside it also feels cheap,like the boning in the bag is cardboard. The bag is slapped together with glue & hope. It doesn’t come stuffed so it holds no shape. Wish quality. Honestly aliexpress might have given something higher performing.

评论概述: Its small, but I was still able to put my stuff in just fine

a cute bag however it came disfigured and misshapen. it also smells of chemicals and you can tell it is cheaply made but that is not so much the problem. mine also came with what looks like unfinished stitching (seen in photo). the biggest problem is the misshapen wings as well as the bag. if anyone knows how to shape faux leather please share.

评论概述: Okay but my zipper was stuck
评论详情: Product came smooshed in a bag, which meant the wings were crushed and stuck that way. I had to heat them with a blow dryer and let them cool to reshape. A shipping box would've been great! Unfortunately, the zipper snags constantly and it was too hard to fight with. I'd consider ordering another and hoping it wasn't as defective but it seems like a toss up. There is a VERY strong plastic smell but it fades enough over a few days that you don't notice unless you hold it closer to your face.
It’s really cute but the actual compartment is really small. Great for pictures but not daily use.

I had this for about 3 months(?) And it finally broke on me. There was multiple times I had to put a bath and body works perfume bottle thru the wings(fits perfectly) to have them curl. I stitched the strap back on but within a month the same side broke again. But alas, I'll get something better. Good for short term.

As much as I really liked this backpack, my zipper completely broke off within a month of having it. It’s something that can be fixed, but just be aware when purchasing that the zipper, or at least mine, was not sturdy

评论概述: Way more space than you think
评论详情: The best feature of this is the space it holds. You can fit a wallet, 2 phones (the annoying current models that are annoyingly large), keys, at least one full sized water bottle, and have room to spare for other items you need during your day/night. I've had this for about 3 months now, and after everyday use the strap is starting to come undone. It's an issue, but I think some superglue will fix it pretty well. Also, the wings turn all over the place on the rivets, so if you want a particular look you'll have to find a way to secure them.

评论概述: Use a HAIR DRYER or THROW IN DRYER FOR FEW
评论详情: I saw a review somewhere where it mentioned throwing the person in the dryer for a couple of minutes to soften the plastic so you can reshape it once it’s out honestly that’s what I did and 100% satisfied 100%.  Purse is adorable as hell one of my favorite purses can’t speak as far as its longevity but once I threw it in the dryer and reshaped it the wings were perfect everything is perfect I love the cute little keychain I am very satisfied. 🤩

bought for myself as more of a fashion backpack than for active use, and as far as ive seen it has held up to that standard. though, the lace folds inward toward the body of the bag and the wings arent entirely prominent unless constantly propped up. it's not very big, i could fit maybe a smaller sketchbook, my phone, wallet, and a bottle if i really forced it. it also had a very unattractive smell for about a week before it completely died down, but i assume that is to be expected with all PU products. despite its difficulties, ive worked around it. i approve of it generally.
Smells like it was in contact with poop and not pleasant to open up at all never had this happen to me first time. Unfortunate cuz it looks cute online. Material was flimsy too.

评论概述: Cute purse after you fix the wings

So yes, it does work but I took off a star for that being necessary. It’s not Christmas yet so it hasn’t been used so I can’t speak to the durability. It looks like the wings are affixed in such a way they will flap when you walk which should be cute.
